Sentencas: A system level modelling study of three combined heat and power systems based on biomass gasification is presented.
Titulo: Thermodynamic performance study of biomass gasification, solid oxide fuel cell and micro gas turbine hybrid systems

Sentencas: Product gas is converted in a micro gas turbine (MGT) in the first system, in a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) in the second system and in a combined SOFC-MGT arrangement in the third system.
Titulo: Thermodynamic performance study of biomass gasification, solid oxide fuel cell and micro gas turbine hybrid systems

Sentencas: An electrochemical model of the SOFC has been developed and calibrated against published data from Topsoe Fuel Cells A/S and the Rise National Laboratory.
Titulo: Thermodynamic performance study of biomass gasification, solid oxide fuel cell and micro gas turbine hybrid systems

Sentencas: The modelled gasifier is based on an up scaled version (similar to 500 kW(th)) of the demonstrated low tar gasifier, Viking, situated at the Technical University of Denmark.
Titulo: Thermodynamic performance study of biomass gasification, solid oxide fuel cell and micro gas turbine hybrid systems

Sentencas: The SOFC converts the syngas more efficiently than the MGT, which is reflected by the energetic electrical efficiency of the gasifier and MGT system in opposition to the gasifier and SOFC configuration -eta(el) =
Titulo: Thermodynamic performance study of biomass gasification, solid oxide fuel cell and micro gas turbine hybrid systems
Thermodynamic performance study of biomass gasification, solid oxide fuel cell and micro gas turbine hybrid systems

Sentencas: By combining the SOFC and MGT, the unconverted syngas from the SOFC is utilised in the MGT to produce more power and the SOFC is pressurised, which improves the efficiency to as much as eta(el) = 50.3%.
Titulo: Thermodynamic performance study of biomass gasification, solid oxide fuel cell and micro gas turbine hybrid systems

Sentencas: Variation of the different operating conditions reveals an optimum for the chosen pressure ratio with respect to the resulting electrical efficiency.
Titulo: Thermodynamic performance study of biomass gasification, solid oxide fuel cell and micro gas turbine hybrid systems

Sentencas: Furthermore, the SOFC operating temperature should be kept high and the cathode temperature gradient maximised.
Titulo: Thermodynamic performance study of biomass gasification, solid oxide fuel cell and micro gas turbine hybrid systems
